title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance
writer: Amit Aryan, Remo D'Souza, Tushar Hiranandani
short_cast: Prabhu Deva, Kay Kay Menon, Ganesh Acharya, Dharmesh Yelande, Salman, Lauren Gottlieb, Noorin Sha, Punit Pathak
cast: Prabhu Deva, Kay Kay Menon, Ganesh Acharya, Dharmesh Yelande, Salman, Lauren Gottlieb, Noorin Sha, Punit Pathak
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Thrown out of the elite dance studio he founded, Vishnu's spirits rebound when he sees young street dancers prepping for an annual contest.
